attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i wanted to see why people like trump so much and why they wanted him as our president but this app didn’t help at all, it just gave me more reasons to not like him at all. this app shouldn’t even be an app, it needs to be taken down from the app store because there is just no point on having it up. it’s useless and just straight up wrong is disrespectful to the anti-trump people and our BLM, LGBTQ+ move. this app is everything against everything we (anti-trump people) have been fighting for.
attributes.title: it sucked!
attributes.userName: it wont let me out bad names

attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i was trying to get a better understanding of why everyone was obsessed with this cheeto man they call their president. as soon as it downloaded my phone crashed and went completely black. then all of a sudden i saw cheetos on my screen and i hate cheetos. i immediately threw my phone against the wall because i couldn’t stand looking at the disgusting orange cheetos any longer and then it broke. i blame this app for breaking my phone and i demand a new one. this app sucked and unless you like cheetos, do not download it. oh i also found out that apparently this cheeto man that everyone loves is racist, sexist, a rapist, and apparently very dumb. i don’t know why so many people love this horrible cheeto man and i don’t know if i want to have this racist cheeto as my president. trump 2020 🧚‍♂️✨💖 but in jail 🧚‍♂️✨💖💫
attributes.title: don’t support racist cheeto man

attributes.review: Before I got the app my life was amazing🥳🤩 my room connected to my kitchen with a slide! I even had a unicorn 🦄named goat would even take me places. My parents even took me to Bora Bora🏝, Hawaii🏖, and Brazil 🇧🇷 . But one day my parents said “why don’t we get the Trump app to just see how it works.” Ik crazy😱😪 when we download the app everything changed my house 🏠 turned brown had cracks and waterleaks 💦EVERYWHERE. Most importantly Goat 🦄 was gone😭. My parents now are super mean 😤, strict, and don’t talk to me or want to raise me. Moral of the story don’t get this app.😔😌
attributes.title: I want my life back😔

attributes.review: my pet lion was in its cage and i decided to download this app to see how 😍 it was then my phone exploded in my hand and it broke open the cage to my pet lion allowing it to escape and run away causing me to go looking for it. i was cooking Cheetos on my oven when i went to do so then when i came back home the Cheetos exploded in the over bcs i left them in the over for too long and my house was on fire so now i don’t hve a lion or my house or my phone. Im writing this on my neighbors microwave 😣 in conclusion NEVER🤮🧚‍♂️ get this app ☺️
attributes.title: my house burnt down and my lion ran away😭

attributes.review: I was so excited to get the app cause I wanted to vote for the least racist Cheeto who ever lived. but the moment I downloaded it I began to tingle, something weird was about to happen then suddenly my phone dinged and on my screen there was a Cheeto wearing a maga hat and it looked at me and jumped right out of my screen. It was small but vicious and I almost died. Since then I deleted the app but Sometimes I can still see a Cheeto out of the corner of my eye. And that deserves zero stars but 1 star is the least I can do but pretend this comment has zero stars
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: i go to download this app but it took three years to down load than when i finally open it my grandma has a heart attack. not thinking of it, i continue to scroll and my phone tunes to 450 degrees and burns all the skin off my hand. i decide to go for a jog through the enchanted forest just to get attacked by trump 2020 freaks. i decide to go home and go back on the app. before i know it my over burst into one big flame and tells my alexa to play fireworks by katy perry. i now have to live under a russian mafia base. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!
attributes.title: burnt my house down

attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! I’m a strong trump supporter and wanted to show my president some love by downloading the app! However once I did my phone started to glitch very bad and I’ve gotten emails from random websites after I put my information in the trump app. I fear my information got hacked into!! What is happening Mr. president? U should be on our side not against us! I’m heartbroken this has happened to my phone I hope it will be fixed soon. Do not get this app unless you want the same to happen to you 💔
attributes.title: This app made my phone glitch and break!

attributes.review: I tried to download the app but it took weeks to download! While I was waiting on the app to download I decided I was going to visit my grandmother because I had nothing else to do. During my stay with my grandma, the app finally downloaded. I opened it with my grandma next to me so we could see how to use it but when I opened it all there was was a bright flashing orange light! The light caused my grandmother to start seizing and she passed away in the hospital shorty after. This app is a killer so don’t download it please!!!!!
attributes.title: How this app killed my grandma

attributes.review: I can’t believe right when I opened the app I saw a Cheeto puff on my screen‼️I would love to support my papichulo president in making america great and being the best in the world. But it is very hard to do so when he is his followers believe that the corona virus 🦠 isn’t real, that we need to do more testing; just because we don’t do testing doesn’t mean there’s no more corona virus.  On the other hand PLEASE DONT DRINK LYSOL‼️ I think that even though our president is trying to make america great again it’s clear to me he’s making it worse.
attributes.title: Very slow
